line_1.text: A close-up of a metal trough filled with an unrecognizable, grayish-brown gelatinous substance. A hairnet-wearing lunch lady hands a ladle full of it towards the screen with a squelch.

line_2.text: Eugh! Maddone. Look at dis muck. You gotta be kiddin' me with dis. It looks like somethin' my Uncle Sal scraped off his boot after a late night down at the docks, y'know what I mean?

line_3.text: It's Tuesday. Tuesday is mystery meat mash. You know this.

line_4.text: Yeah, but da mystery should be "what animal is dis," not "is dis ed-i-ble matter." It ain't right, Dot. We deserve better than trough slop.
